body_html: If we're working around a bug in the upstream HIP files, we should say so in the code that is implementing the workaround, so that when HIP fixes their cmake we know what to eliminate.
body_text: If we're working around a bug in the upstream HIP files, we should say so in the code that is implementing the workaround, so that when HIP fixes their cmake we know what to eliminate.
body: If we're working around a bug in the upstream HIP files, we should say so in the code that is implementing the workaround, so that when HIP fixes their cmake we know what to eliminate.
